title: Qualitative Research-Based Workshop for Enhancing Student Teaching Practicum Lesson Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of elementary education curricula and experience in lesson design
context.additional_context: Practical training program for current elementary school teachers to solve lesson design challenges encountered during student teaching supervision

learning_goals: Learning objective articulation skills can be improved by analyzing lesson design elements aligned with the 2013 curriculum standards.
Instructional design issues can be systematically diagnosed, and improvement plans can be proposed by applying qualitative research methods.
A decision-making framework can be developed for selecting diverse learning media and instructional strategies.
Develop lesson plans applicable to real-world teaching practicum scenarios through project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
